name: The forgotten underground
description:
..what is this strange place?

...just empty and abandond houses everywhere you look.

...how did you get here?

You need to escape this horrible place but how?

..and is there even an exit?

WASD: Move

R : Interact

Space: cancle reading letter / progress in dialogue

ESC: pause

This is a horror game with 3 / 4 endings where you need to escape the old ruins of the capital of ?$2=].

But be careful everyone who entered the forgotten underground never returned!

This is my first game I ever really made so if you have any tipps for me in the future please write them in the comments!

side note:

English is not my native language so there may be some gramatical and spelling mistakes if you found some please just notify me about them! 

Currently this game has some bugs and I am working on that!

This game contains Flashing Images as well as jumpscares!
